title: CMake build update
body_html:
I am trying to separate changes in cmake and TF core code changes in two PRs regarding this old PR

several new features are added in this contrib:

  • better CMake GUI experience
  • better linux build setting
  • abseil_cpp update to match latest tf dependency requirement
  • only find python interpreter if user want to build python binding
  • TF is still on 9.0, few weeks ago someone changes min version to 9.1 (https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source#tested_source_configurations)
  • MSVC CMake GUI build instruction added in readme
  • CMake packaging, can generate shared libraries on all platforms. C++ api can be used via cmake instructions in CMakeLists.txt:
find_package(Tensorflow REQUIRED)
include_directories(${TENSORFLOW_INCLUDE_DIRS})
  • new tf ops added
  • improved windows gpu build compatibility

TF is still on 9.0, few weeks ago someone changes min version to 9.1 (https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source#tested_source_configurations)
MSVC CMake GUI build instruction added in readme
CMake packaging, can generate shared libraries on all platforms. C++ api can be used via cmake instructions in CMakeLists.txt:

new tf ops added
improved windows gpu build compatibility
body:
I am trying to separate changes in cmake and TF core code changes in two PRs regarding [this old PR](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/16480)

several new features are added in this contrib:
- better CMake GUI experience
- better linux build setting
- abseil_cpp update to match latest tf dependency requirement
- only find python interpreter if user want to build python binding
- TF is still on 9.0, few weeks ago someone changes min version to 9.1 (https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source#tested_source_configurations)
- MSVC CMake GUI build instruction added in readme
- CMake packaging, can generate shared libraries on all platforms. C++ api can be used via cmake instructions in CMakeLists.txt: 
 ```cmake
find_package(Tensorflow REQUIRED)
include_directories(${TENSORFLOW_INCLUDE_DIRS})
```
- new tf ops added
- improved windows gpu build compatibility
